metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15133 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In GIFLIB before 2019-02-16, a malformed GIF file triggers a divide-by-zero exception in the decoder function DGifSlurp in dgif_lib.c if the height field of the ImageSize data structure is equal to zero.

criterions.comment: giflib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
